_comment: Template for error message when rate limits are exceeded

error._comment: HTTP status code for Too Many Requests

details._comment: Requests remaining in the current window
ISO 8601 timestamp for when the limit resets
Rate limiting algorithm used (token_bucket, sliding_window, fixed_window)
Scope of the rate limit (user, ip, global)
Key used for rate limiting (e.g., user ID, IP address)
Seconds to wait before retrying the request (for Retry-After header)
URL to documentation about rate limiting
Support email for questions about rate limits
